summary: This document is an email chain from November 6, 2021, between an FBI Special Agent and an Assistant United States Attorney regarding scheduling a call to discuss logistics for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial. It shows coordination between law enforcement and prosecutors.

persons.name: Michael
persons.context: Addressed in an email by an Assistant United States Attorney to schedule a call regarding the Maxwell trial logistics.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Initiates email to FBI Special Agent Michael to schedule a call with the trial team to discuss logistics for the Maxwell trial.

connections.description: Coordinating a call to discuss logistics for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial, indicating a working relationship between prosecution and law enforcement.

events.title: Scheduled call on Maxwell trial logistics
events.description: A call is scheduled between an FBI Special Agent and the trial team (prosecutors) to discuss logistics for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.

keyFacts: The email chain is dated November 6, 2021, showing ongoing coordination for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.
An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York is contacting an FBI Special Agent (Michael) to schedule a logistics call.
The call was scheduled for Monday, November 8, 2021, at 10:30 AM.
The correspondence indicates active preparation and collaboration between prosecutors and the FBI's Violent Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking Task Force.
The subject matter confirms the Maxwell trial was a focus of federal law enforcement and prosecution efforts in late 2021.
